user.title: Duux Fan Setup Method
user.description: Choose how you want to set up your Duux fan integration

data_description.setup_method:
Automated: Use built-in proxy to automatically capture credentials from the Duux app
Manual: Enter device ID and JWT token manually

manual_setup.title: Manual Duux Fan Setup
manual_setup.description: Enter your Duux fan device ID and JWT token

proxy_instructions.title: Configure Your Mobile Device
proxy_instructions.description:
**Step 1: Configure proxy settings on your mobile device:**
   - Host: {proxy_host}
   - Port: {proxy_port}
   - Enable 'Use for HTTPS' or similar SSL option

**Step 2: Install SSL certificate (required for HTTPS interception):**
   - Open a web browser on your mobile device
   - Navigate to: http://mitm.it
   - Download and install the mitmproxy certificate for your platform
   - **Important:** Enable the certificate in your device's trusted certificate store

**Step 3: Use the Duux app:**
   - Open the Duux mobile app
   - Control your fan (turn on/off, change speed, etc.)
   - The integration will automatically capture your credentials

**Step 4:** Click 'Continue' when ready or 'Cancel' to abort

**Note:** Remember to remove the proxy settings and certificate after setup!

credential_capture.title: Capturing Credentials
credential_capture.description:
Waiting for credentials from the Duux app...

Please use your Duux mobile app to control your fan. The integration will automatically detect and capture your device ID and JWT token.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Duux API
error.capture_timeout: Timeout waiting for credentials. Please ensure your mobile device is configured correctly and you're using the Duux app.
error.incomplete_credentials: Could not capture complete credentials. Please try again or use manual setup.
error.invalid_captured_credentials: The captured credentials are invalid. Please try again or use manual setup.

auth_failed.title: Duux Fan Authentication Failed
auth_failed.description:
The JWT token for your Duux fan (Device ID: {device_id}) has expired or is invalid. Please update your integration configuration with a fresh token.

To obtain a new token:
1. Use a network proxy tool (Proxyman, Wireshark, or Charles Proxy)
2. Set up SSL proxying for the Duux API host
3. Use the Duux mobile app to control your fan
4. Extract the new JWT token from the Authorization header
5. Reconfigure the integration with the new token
